typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		UID as string,
		SLI_ID as string,
		Ops_Report_ID as string,
		Metric_Group as string,
		Metric_Sub_Group as string,
		Metric_Name as string,
		Requirement_Question as string,
		Parent_UID as string,
		Reference as string,
		Dimension as string,
		Reporting_Format as string,
		Report_Frequency as string,
		Active as string,
		Forest as string,
		Saw_Mill as string,
		Carbon as string,
		AUS as string,
		NZ as string,
		US as string,
		Malaysia as string,
		Indonesia as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB
source(output(
		UID as string,
		SLI_ID as string,
		Ops_Report_ID as string,
		Metric_Group as string,
		Metric_Sub_Group as string,
		Metric_Name as string,
		Requirement_Question as string,
		Parent_UID as string,
		Reference as string,
		Dimension as string,
		Reporting_Format as string,
		Report_Frequency as string,
		Active as string,
		Forest as string,
		Saw_Mill as string,
		Carbon as string,
		AUS as string,
		NZ as string,
		US as string,
		Malaysia as string,
		Indonesia as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> LoadFromScrubbedGetParentUID
LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB select(mapColumn(
		UID,
		SLI_ID,
		Ops_Report_ID,
		Metric_Group,
		Metric_Sub_Group,
		Metric_Name,
		Requirement_Question,
		Parent_UID,
		Reference,
		Dimension,
		Reporting_Format,
		Report_Frequency,
		Active,
		Forest,
		Saw_Mill,
		Carbon,
		AUS,
		NZ,
		US,
		Malaysia,
		Indonesia
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectSourceColumns
LoadFromScrubbedGetParentUID filter(UID==Parent_UID || isNull(Parent_UID)) ~> FilterGetParent
FilterGetParent select(mapColumn(
		Lkp_UID = UID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectParentUIDlookup
DerivedNonNullParentUID, SelectParentUIDlookup lookup(Derived_NonNull_ParentUID == Lkp_UID,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupParentUID
LookupParentUID derive(Validation_Error = iif(isNull(Lkp_UID),toString('Question Parent relationship error'),toString(null()))) ~> ComputeValidationField
ComputeValidationField select(mapColumn(
		UID,
		SLI_ID,
		Ops_Report_ID,
		Metric_Group,
		Metric_Sub_Group,
		Metric_Name,
		Requirement_Question,
		Parent_UID,
		Reference,
		Dimension,
		Reporting_Format,
		Report_Frequency,
		Active,
		Forest,
		Saw_Mill,
		Carbon,
		AUS,
		NZ,
		US,
		Malaysia,
		Indonesia,
		Lkp_UID,
		Lkp_Parent_UID,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectColumns
SelectSourceColumns derive(Derived_NonNull_ParentUID = coalesce(Parent_UID, UID)) ~> DerivedNonNullParentUID
SelectColumns sink(input(
		UID as string,
		SLI_ID as string,
		Ops_Report_ID as string,
		Metric_Group as string,
		Metric_Sub_Group as string,
		Metric_Name as string,
		Requirement_Question as string,
		Parent_UID as string,
		Reference as string,
		Dimension as string,
		Reporting_Format as string,
		Report_Frequency as string,
		Active as string,
		Forest as string,
		Saw_Mill as string,
		Carbon as string,
		AUS as string,
		NZ as string,
		US as string,
		Malaysia as string,
		Indonesia as string,
		Validation_Error as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		UID,
		SLI_ID,
		Ops_Report_ID,
		Metric_Group,
		Metric_Sub_Group,
		Metric_Name,
		Requirement_Question,
		Parent_UID,
		Reference,
		Dimension,
		Reporting_Format,
		Report_Frequency,
		Active,
		Forest,
		Saw_Mill,
		Carbon,
		AUS,
		NZ,
		US,
		Malaysia,
		Indonesia,
		Validation_Error
	)) ~> StagingDB
